newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Autodesk unveils new version software.
newsitem.headline: Autodesk unveils new version software.

text.p: Autodesk Inc unveiled upgraded software on Tuesday for computer-aided design ahead of its official launch in the United States.
It said in a statement that the government, private sector and educational institutes had committed to take delivery of about 800 copies of its AutoCAD Release 14 product.
The new software was twice as fast as Release 13 for Windows and significantly faster than Release 12 for DOS, it said.
Autodesk is a leading supplier of PC design software and multimedia tools, and its products are used for architectural and mechanical design and film and video production.
